Texts.Default: Форсюк вадим дурна і глупа людина і якщо він не знайде нам срані картинки я його вб'ю і замордую нахуй і він помре в страшних муках бо він винен в страшних речах і нема йому прощення
Texts.Dexter: So the adventures of poor Dexter ended, life away from friends did not go to his advantage
Texts.BookInCamp: Hello hunter. By the time you read this, I’m probably already dead. But this is not at all scary, because now there is a person responsible for hunting here again. Everything is simple here, you go out there, you kill...
Texts.BookInCamp2: ...and bring it here. Here you will be given cartridges and again to hunt. Just be careful, you're not the only hunter here. Apart from tasty and warm game, the forest is teeming with wolves. Be careful and good luck...!
Texts.BookInCamp3: And, I completely forgot, go to the lost camp north of here. It seems there were living people there recently.
Texts.NoteInLostCamp: ... saw an adventurer here ... completely crazy, sometimes stupid ... not afraid. He went to drink water from the well ... damn ... spiders ... fool. I'll have to find him, pick him up ...
Texts.NoteNearWell: Water ... I want water. Wolves are everywhere. I can't catch anyone. Spiders for some reason do not attack. I saw such a beautiful spider ... I want to describe it for my memoirs! Faster, there!
Texts.NoteOnSpider:
He was here. He died protecting the cart. All that's left is...
Press F to pay respect!
